title: Update?
body: So, it's a new day and I wanted to play league. I double tap the icon on my screen then it loads. It loads a screen, the client, and says, "league of legends need to require an update." And it loads automatically. It opens this small screen and says league of legends on the top and the loading bar below it. It reaches about almost all the way then restarts again. Then, it says "league of legends need to require and update" AGAIN! I need help! I have a Mac by the way.

replies.body:
Are you still experiencing this? If so, I recommend launching League from your **Applications** folder rather than a shortcut on the dock or desktop. If you still see the same symptoms afterward, I'd recommend working through our [**Patching Issues Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#section-mac) to address some other common solutions for this issue.

If you weren't able to resolve the issue with these steps, let me know.
I'm okay now all i did was left it alone until tomorrow and it works some how. Takes for you reply though!
